body:
Comment 1: 
"If the type is absent and the corresponding expression evaluates to an untyped
constant, the type of the declared variable is bool, int, float64, or string
respectively, depending on whether the value is a boolean, integer, floating-point, or
string constant"
http://golang.org/doc/go_spec.html#Variable_declarations

package main

var a interface{}

func main() {
	a = int64(1000000000000)
}
